front.title: Network Mobility Support in IPv6:Problem Statement and Requirements

abstract.t: This draft addresses the problems of routing datagrams to nodeslocated in an IPv6 mobile network. A mobile network is one or moreIP-subnets attached to a mobile router and mobile as a unit. Themobile router dynamically changes its point of attachment.Applications of mobile networks include networks attached to people(PANs) and networks of sensors deployed in an aircraft, a boat, or acar.
